Room.Name: The Pink Drake Inn
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a rowdy little inn named after some local fauna.
Room.LongDescription: As you look around you notice that most of the patrons seem to be Orcs. Even the bartender and the serving girls are Orcs, but there are a few other races here. Most of the noise sounds to be coming from a betting table set up near a veranda overlooking an outdoor pit. A lot of high pitched hissing and growling seems to be heard from directly below the crowd gathered on the veranda. When you look closer, you realize there are pink drakes in a fighting pit down there!
